typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'sample',
	fileName: 'part-00000-7b2b2c30-eb5e-4ab6-af89-28fae7bdb9e4-c000.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> storagesource
storagesource select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter("Country" !="US") ~> Filter1
